data.name: Jaki's Wacky Adventure
data.detailed_description:
Jaki's Wacky Adventure is an action packed 2.5d RPG shooter where you are a powerful & clever ninja fox. Wield your ninja star with deadly accuracy as you dodge enemy fire & avoid lethal hazards and defeat clever enemies. Travel from your peaceful forest home in Eureka to the quaint & colorful Toon Town to help the residents catch a killer & restore peace to their home. Be prepared for surprises & challenging problems as you pursue an escaped killer to Chillgrave Keep.

Game Features


Battle Bugs, Beasts & Robots to Become the Best Ninja in the Land!
Your mission is to find & catch a killer. Numerous powerful & tricky enemies will try to stop you. Wield your ninja star with deadly accuracy as you dodge enemy fire, avoid lethal hazards and improve your ninja skills. Can you beat your best score and become Jonin (the best ninja in the land)?


Discover Rare Items & Improve Your Skills
Explore hidden areas & discover valuable rare items that level up your skills.


Craft powerful potions!
Collect plants & powerful crystals. Apply crafted potions to ninja stars to increase damage or freeze enemies. Health potions restore health or make you invincible.

Solve Puzzling Challenges!
I am DYING to press that shiny red button!
Prepare for the unexpected as you face puzzling challenges. How do you press that shiny red button? Easy - you can quickly run across the deadly ice spikes. But when you arrive on the other side, you do not weigh enough to press the button. Now you are trapped unless you risk death on the ice spikes to get back to the path. And you still want to press that shiny red button!


Meet interesting characters!
Along your journey, you meet interesting characters. Meet eccentric scientists, like Einstein in Eureka. Or, meet cute lovable characters in Toon Town. Choose to help them with their problems and receive valuable resources which improve your chances of success.


Manage Your Resources
You may buy & sell resources IF you can stand Y-Lee Weasel's prices. Or collect and craft items that improve your skills, enhance your health, or increase damage. Some powerful potions are rare, so use them strategically.

data.short_description: Jakiâ€™s Wacky Adventure is an action-packed, cartoony 2.5d RPG shooter. Wield shuriken with deadly accuracy as you battle bugs, beasts & robots. Explore strange lands. Discover hidden locations & rare items that improve your skills. Craft powerful potions. Can you become the best ninja in the land?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 (SP1+), Windows 10 and Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500K 3.3GHz / AMD FX-8150 3.6GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 9 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible soundcard
  • Additional Notes: Optimized for 16:9. Not compatible with ultra wide screen, optional windowed mode provided
